    • img1clicked

      public void img1clicked()
      Handles all events of image 1 being clicked. Checks which flags (if any) are set off and sends the appropriate dialogs to allow them to make the changes necessary to that photo file any updates and changes are then saved immediately by the admin listofusers array

    • img2clicked
